title: ARAM Key Fragments
body: Hello, I was just wondering if when the "ARAM dropping key fragments" fix was in place, would we be back paid any key fragments, I play a ton of ARAMs, so I was just wondering.

replies.body: Not yet :(  As a now mostly-ARAM player, I'm also waiting for those sweet sweet key drops!  Don't have an ETA yet though, but the team is working on it
I'm sorry, maybe I worded the question weird.  I was asking if we will get any kind of back pay in key fragments once it is fixed, since they were supposed to be given?  thanks
I don't believe so, no.  But looks like the ARAM/Twisted Treeline fix is in for 6.7, so barring any major issues, should be able to start earning key fragments in ARAM!

A different ARAM question...

Any headway on Champion Mastery for ARAM and TT?

Especially seeing how the RGMs get to have it!
Right on.. thanks for the update
good to know Riot is working to resolve this problem XD
